extends java.lang.Object

      • getTaskInfo

        public static TaskInfo getTaskInfo(StateStore stateStore,
                                   TaskStatus taskStatus)
                            throws StateStoreException
        Verifies that the supplied TaskStatus corresponds to a single TaskInfo in the provided StateStore and returns the TaskInfo.
        Returns:
        The singular TaskInfo if it is present
        Throws:
        StateStoreException - if no corresponding TaskInfo is found.
        StateStoreException - if multiple corresponding TaskInfo's are found.
